level.heading: Declarant's easement over common elements for purpose of improvements, etc.
level.text: Subject to any restrictions and limitations the condominium instruments may specify, the declarant shall have a transferable easement over and on the common elements for the purpose of making improvements on the submitted land and any additional land pursuant to the provisions of those instruments and of this chapter, and for the purpose of doing all things reasonably necessary and proper in connection therewith.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-89, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-1901.01.
